Tucson switches to high beams inside the tunnel and supports Perceptor's qu=
estion as he beams the lights predominantly on the insectual beings.

" You=
 will answer his question accordingly or else I will be forced to instill s=
ome measures of disciplinary actions.  Now, as Perceptor has asked, and you=
 WILL tell the truth..  WHERE IS RODIMUS PRIME?!"

He rolls right up to the=
 insects, as tires crumble dirt and pebbles beneath them. His suspension sy=
stem adapts to the terrain beneath him, as his vehicular frame seems to til=
t according to the shape of the ground beneath him, allowing safe travel fo=
r his comrades.  At the same time, Quick Stride and Straight Shot prepare f=
or confrontation while holding weapons in place.  Straight Shot looks back =
to Legacy and Talon.

Guys, if those bugs try anything funny, give 'em a re=
minder that we're not playing around either."

Quickstride snorts.

" Yeah,=
 whatever game they plan ta play, we can play too."

Tucson waits for the i=
nsect's answer as his engine idols with a loud rumbling noise of a typical =
truck.

yes and several smaller ones. However what may

lls' were composed of a strange metallic
